page.title: 13Industrial Estate
page.content: There are several small units where companies work. There are eleven different companies working within a 30 to 40 mile radius of North Weald.These include Harlow Fencing, employing 15 people.There are 200 types of fencing and 10 different sizes are made. Another is a duplicating company called Talbot press where there are two workers and a dog. Pumnell and Company make fancy staircases and employ 10 to 12 people, working 4 hours a day. They work all over Essex and London and most of their work is done by hand. 15 people are employed by Harrington brothers who tarmac road surfaces. They work 8 hours a day. W J Crump is a car mechanic working 5 days a week in a car repair shop. Pretloves removals and storage is a bigger firm where 20 people are employed.
